ai.summary: Farm Trail is a short, easy 2.8 km hike in the UK. It’s suitable for beginners and families, offering gentle terrain and rural farmland scenery with straightforward navigation.
ai.terrain_summary: The route runs along farm paths, compacted earth, and grassy sections. Expect occasional muddy patches after rain and gates or stiles to pass through; sturdy footwear with good grip is recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Always check access rights and property signs and stay on public paths. Be mindful of livestock and gates, and close gates behind you. Weather can change quickly; bring extra layers, water, and a snack. Wear sturdy shoes with good grip and carry a map or GPS. If you bring a dog, keep it under control and clean up after it where required. Plan for shorter daylight in winter and start early.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS / smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: All year, with spring to autumn generally more pleasant; in winter be prepared for mud and reduced daylight.

seo.title: Farm Trail – Easy 2.8 km hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Farm Trail, an easy 2.8 km hike in the UK. Simple terrain, rural scenery, practical safety tips, and gear recommendations for a short outdoor stroll.
